channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 46 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Frankenstein, Troll 2, and A House of Dynamite are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The 46 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Stranger Things, The Beast in Me, and Last Samurai Standing are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: Mad Men’s special effects foreman hasn’t seen the infamous 4K remaster
item.description: Everyone had a good laugh at HBO Max this week when the new 4K Mad Men remaster debuted with a number of glaring errors that should have been caught before the show was uploaded to the streamer's servers. Episodes went live with incorrect titles, and in one instance you could still see members of the […]

item.title: I tried Huawei's strange Pura X foldable, and it's made me rethink every other flip phone
item.description: I've spent several months with Huawei's Pura X foldable, and it's convinced me that flip phones should be mini tablets.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, December 7 (game #910)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, December 7 (game #644)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, December 7 (game #1413)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Ouverture focale en photo : tout comprendre, du flou d’arrière-plan à la netteté de vos images
item.description: L’ouverture focale ne se contente pas de laisser entrer plus ou moins de lumière. Elle décide aussi de la part nette et floue de vos images, du bokeh d’un portrait à la netteté d’un paysage. Comprendre comment fonctionnent les valeurs d’ouverture, de f/1,4 à f/16, permet de sortir vraiment du mode automatique et d’assumer vos choix créatifs plutôt que de subir ceux de l’appareil. ...

item.title: AI ‘creators’ might just crash the influencer economy
item.description: It was only in June that Jeremy Carrasco uploaded his first videos to TikTok and Instagram. In that short time, he's amassed over 300,000 followers on each platform. No, it's not exactly Charli D'Amelio numbers, but that does make him one of the biggest names in AI literacy on social media. Jeremy told The Verge […]

item.title: Dans un pack à moins de 180 €, le Xiaomi Redmi 15C 5G fait un bon smartphone pas cher à glisser sous le sapin de Noël
item.description: Malgré son faible prix, le Xiaomi Redmi 15C 5G n'est pas exempt de qualité et peut compter sur une bonne autonomie. Pour vous convaincre, Darty a créé une offre incluant ce smartphone et une paire d'écouteurs Redmi Buds 6 Play pour 179 euros contre 224 euros en temps normal.

item.title: Horses deserves to be played, even if it’s not very good
item.description: Horses has become the current face of the fight against video game censorship and what gets to be art. After getting banned from Steam and the Epic Game Store, the narrative horror game has become a bestseller on GOG.com, and has brought gamers of all stripes together in support of it. But as a game, […]

item.title: After you check out your Spotify Wrapped 2025, explore these copycats
item.description: Spotify’s annual Wrapped feature just dropped, giving listeners a fun, personalized summary of their listening habits. It has gained immense popularity over the years, and as a result, many companies have seized the opportunity to create similar year-in-review experiences, offering users a recap of their habits, preferences, or interactions from the past year. Here are […]...

item.title: Why are companies not tackling their Windows technical debt?
item.description: With Windows 10 support now ended, organizations are confronting the scale of their technical debt.

item.title: Robin Hood episode 7 drops on MGM+ this weekend, but I doubt it can beat the scene that ‘terrified’ its own cast
item.description: Last week's episode of Robin Hood might have had the scene of all scenes, so much so that anything else is automatically in the shade.

item.title: Genshin Impact is coming to Duolingo in bizarre new crossover
item.description: The world of Genshin Impact is coming to language learning app Duolingo in a weird crossover.

item.title: Your Spotify Wrapped 2025 data isn't wrong – the streaming giant just revealed all about how it's calculated
item.description: Spotify has revealed more details about the data and statistical tricks it uses to produce your Wrapped.
